actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to prescribe manning requirements for certain small craft propelled by steam, and for certain vessels propelled by mechanical or electrical power, carrying freight or passengers for hire.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to promulgate regulations specifying the duties and qualifications of the operators and crews of specified types of vessels.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to prescribe manning requirements for certain small craft propelled by steam, and for certain vessels propelled by mechanical or electrical power, carrying freight or passengers for hire.
